column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for New Circle Rd at Boardwalk:
column4: Motorists accessing New Circle Rd from Boardwalk or Colesbury Cir will experience signal timing and lane configuration changes, especially during left turns.

column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for New Circle Rd at Boardwalk:
column4: Both approaches now access New Circle Rd at the same time.  Previously, one side accessed New Circle Rd before the other side.

column3: Traffic Pattern Changes for New Circle Rd at Boardwalk:
column4: Use added caution while traffic adjusts to the new patterns.
